settings.title: Hero w/ Content & Imagery
settings.heading: Lideres en Vitamina C
settings.paragraph: Hailed as an anti-ageing superstar and a core part of the Medik8 regime, vitamin C is a must-have in any morning skincare routine. Our collection of vitamin C products are expertly crafted with only scientifically proven forms of vitamin C within stabilised formulations. We have a format for everyone; nourishing creams, potent serums and SPF combinations.

settings.title: Intro Paragraph
settings.paragraph: Hailed as an anti-ageing superstar and a core part of the Medik8 regime, vitamin C is a must-have in any morning skincare routine. Our collection of vitamin C products are expertly crafted with only scientifically proven forms of vitamin C within stabilised formulations. We have a format for everyone; nourishing creams, potent serums and SPF combinations.

settings.title: Content - Feature
settings.paragraph: There are many different forms of vitamin C. However, they all work toward the same end goal – luminous, youthful and protected skin. Vitamin C works with your skin cells to stimulate collagen production while also helping to block the enzyme that causes pigmentation. Considered one of the best antioxidants in skincare, vitamin C is able to fight off free radicals which can cause premature ageing. Free radicals are highly reactive molecules with an unpaired electron. Deprived of an electron, they attempt to complete their pair by stealing an electron from other molecules.

settings.title: Content - Feature
settings.paragraph: Our body has a natural defence system of antioxidants, which give the free radicals a spare electron to stop them doing damage to our skin cells. When there are more free radicals than antioxidants the skin becomes overwhelmed in a process called oxidative stress where it cannot protect itself fully from free radical damage. The radicals can attack collagen molecules, cellular DNA and cell membranes to weaken them. This impairs cellular regeneration leading to sagging and wrinkled skin. Vitamin C provides the body’s natural antioxidant system with a boost to help it fight off free radicals; shielding the skin from their damaging effects. Antioxidants are exceptionally important in our morning routine to provide all-day protection from the environment.

settings.title: Content - Feature
settings.paragraph: Vitamin C provides the body’s natural antioxidant system with a boost to help it fight off free radicals; shielding the skin from their damaging effects. Antioxidants are exceptionally important in our morning routine to provide all-day protection from the environment. While vitamin C is exceptional at targeting signs of ageing, there is one small challenge. Pure vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid) is ridiculously unstable in water-based formulations. In water, vitamin C is oxidised and causes a cascade of reactions in which it loses its power and can even become a pro-oxidant - meaning it can form free radicals itself. This leaves many customers frustrated and unhappy. But not at Medik8. We don’t believe you have to compromise - the perfect vitamin C serum is stable, feels amazing on the skin and provides exceptional skin protection against antioxidants. We have formulated with 3 different, proven forms of vitamin C so you don’t have to settle.

Our body has a natural defence system of antioxidants, which give the free radicals a spare electron to stop them doing damage to our skin cells. When there are more free radicals than antioxidants the skin becomes overwhelmed in a process called oxidative stress where it cannot protect itself fully from free radical damage. The radicals can attack collagen molecules, cellular DNA and cell membranes to weaken them. This impairs cellular regeneration leading to sagging and wrinkled skin.

Vitamin C provides the body’s natural antioxidant system with a boost to help it fight off free radicals; shielding the skin from their damaging effects. Antioxidants are exceptionally important in our morning routine to provide all-day protection from the environment.

While vitamin C is exceptional at targeting signs of ageing, there is one small challenge. Pure vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid) is ridiculously unstable in water-based formulations. In water, vitamin C is oxidised and causes a cascade of reactions in which it loses its power and can even become a pro-oxidant - meaning it can form free radicals itself. This leaves many customers frustrated and unhappy. But not at Medik8. We don’t believe you have to compromise - the perfect vitamin C serum is stable, feels amazing on the skin and provides exceptional skin protection against antioxidants. We have formulated with 3 different, proven forms of vitamin C so you don’t have to settle.

settings.title: Content - Standard
settings.heading: Inside Our Vitamin C Range

settings.title: Content w/ 2 Columns
settings.block1_paragraph_1:
This is the vitamin C for purists looking for results. We have gone to exceptional measures to make sure our Pure C15™, containing 15% ascorbic acid,is highly stable before opening, and lasts for at least 8 weeks once opened. Delivered in two separate bottles, you get 2 x 8 weeks supply of vitamin C - making it great value for money.

We have optimised our formula’s pH to make sure the ascorbic acid has the most effect, but with minimised irritation. We produce the formula in a chamber saturated with nitrogen, rather than air, to stop ascorbic acid from coming into contact with oxygen and becoming unstable. Ascorbic acid is combined with vitamin E and glutathione, two other antioxidants naturally found in the body.

This antioxidant complex mimics the skin’s natural defensive system and forms a rechargeable antioxidant network. The antioxidants work synergistically to boost their overall antioxidant power, while regenerating each other for long-lasting potency. This means that the vitamin C is uninterrupted to help stimulate collagen production and to help inhibit the formation of hyperpigmentation, for brighter, younger-looking skin.
settings.block2_paragraph_1: An oil-soluble derivative of vitamin C, tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate has a long name and a long shelf life. Super stable and ideal for penetrating deep within the skin’s lipid barrier, this derivative provides an easy entry-point to the vitamin C range, with very little irritation. Included in our C-Tetra® range along with beneficial emollient oils; tetrahexyldecyl ascorbate is perfect for targeting lines and wrinkles while leaving skin nourished and cared for.
settings.block2_paragraph_2: Last but not least, introducing our most powerful form of vitamin C in Super C30™. The molecule is based on ascorbic acid but has a carbon chain attached to the most reactive part of the molecule, which stops it from being oxidised. This means ethylated ascorbic acid retains all of the efficacy of pure vitamin C without any of the stability issues. Expect a slight tingle when you apply this due to its potency, which will subside within a few minutes. We only ever use chirally correct vitamin C in all our products to ensure it reaches its full potential on the skin.

settings.title: Content - Feature
settings.paragraph:
Looking to elevate your results with vitamin C? It's simple discover CSA.

In 2009, we invented the CSA Philosophy. Incredibly simple and grounded in science - it just works. This CSA method is becoming more and more mainstream by the day and we couldn't be happier. Just use a vitamin C plus sunscreen by day, vitamin A by night. That's it.

If you look after your skin and follow our simple advice, we believe you can look 40 when you’re 50.

settings.heading: Lideres  en Vitamina C
settings.paragraph: Aclamada por sus eficaces beneficios antioxidantes, potenciadores de la luminosidad y del colágeno, la vitamina C es imprescindible en cualquier rutina diaria de cuidado de la piel. Nuestra avanzada gama de vitamina C solo contiene formas de vitamina C científicamente probadas, que estabilizamos de forma experta para garantizar una potencia óptima y unos resultados máximos con una irritación mínima.

settings.heading: Los Beneficios de la Vitamina C

settings.main_heading: ¿Qué hace la Vitamina C de Medik8 única?

settings.main_paragraph: La vitamina C es notoriamente inestable, lo que significa que pierde rápidamente su eficacia cuando entra en contacto con el aire, la luz y el calor. Por eso sólo formulamos con formas probadas de vitamina C, que estabilizamos de forma experta para garantizar una potencia óptima y los máximos resultados visibles hasta la última gota. Creemos que la fórmula perfecta de vitamina C existe, y es estable, tiene un tacto increíble en la piel y proporciona unos beneficios visibles impresionantes sin causar irritación.

settings.main_heading: Descubre Nuestra Línea de Vitamina C
settings.main_paragraph: En Medik8, tenemos una vitamina C para cada tipo de piel y estilo de vida: desde cremas nutritivas y potentes sueros hasta fórmulas híbridas con SPF.

settings.heading: Who’s it for?
settings.paragraph:
C-Tetra
Those with particularly sensitive skin, looking for the perfect entry point to vitamin C use.

C-Tetra Luxe
Those looking for all-round skin health and supercharged radiance.

settings.main_heading: Línea C-Tetra®: Para piel radiante y de apariencia juvenil
settings.main_paragraph:
Beneficios de los productos
Nuestros sérums héroes C-Tetra (C-Tetra y C-Tetra Luxe) no sólo proporcionan una piel visiblemente más suave, luminosa y con un tono más uniforme, sino que también garantizan una experiencia sensorial de lujo. Además, ambas fórmulas han demostrado su eficacia sin irritar la piel sensible.

settings.paragraph:
Ingredientes estrella
Nuestra línea superventas C-Tetra está compuesta por ascorbato de tetrahexildecilo, una forma estabilizada y suave de vitamina C que penetra profundamente en la barrera cutánea para potenciar la luminosidad visible y suavizar las líneas de expresión y las arrugas.

¿Para quién es?
C-Tetra es para las personas con piel especialmente sensible, que buscan el punto de entrada perfecto para el uso de la vitamina C.
C-Tetra Luxe es para quienes buscan una piel sana y radiante.

¿Qué más contiene la línea C-TetraⓇ?

En la línea puedes encontrar el suero para el contorno de ojos - C-Tetra Eye, nuestra hidratante multifuncional con SPF y vitamina C - Daily Radiance Vitamin C, y nuestra crema hidratante C-Tetra Cream.

settings.main_heading: Super C Ferulic™: Para unos resultados luminosos y antienvejecimiento definitivos.

settings.paragraph:
¿Qué hace?
Super C Ferulic es nuestra fórmula de vitamina C más potente y ofrece resultados visibles y rápidos sobre los signos avanzados del envejecimiento. Se ha demostrado que Super C Ferulic reduce notablemente el aspecto de las líneas de expresión y las arrugas e ilumina el tono irregular de la piel en solo 7 días.[1]

Ingredientes estrella
Super C Ferulic está formulado con un 30% de ácido L-ascórbico etilado, expertamente estabilizado y potenciado por una mezcla sinérgica de antioxidantes, incluido el ácido ferúlico, para un máximo poder antienvejecimiento.

¿Para quién es?
Formulado para que actue de manera rápida, Super C Ferulic es ideal para quienes presentan signos avanzados de envejecimiento y desean obtener resultados visibles en profundidad.

[1]Demostrado mediante un estudio de consumidores independiente realizado durante 7 días en 41 participantes.

settings.main_heading: Pure C15™ : Pure vitamin C power

settings.paragraph:
What does it do?
This pure ascorbic acid serum effectively supports collagen production while delivering powerful protection against free radical damage. The result? A more radiant, youthful-looking complexion with a refined texture.

Star ingredients
Our Pure C15 serum is formulated with 15% L-ascorbic acid, which we boost with vitamin E and glutathione for supercharged antioxidant power.

To create Pure C15™, L-ascorbic acid has been expertly stabilised and optimised so that it remains potent for at least 8 weeks once opened - all while remaining gentle on the skin.

Who’s it for?
Pure C15 is perfect for those vitamin C purists who are looking for a pure ascorbic acid formula.

settings.main_heading: Completa tu rutina de cuidado de la piel
settings.main_paragraph: Potencia y mantiene los beneficios visibles de la vitamina C combinándola con protección solar y vitamina A. Este potente trío es fundamental para conseguir una piel de aspecto más joven en general y conforma la pionera Filosofía CSA<sup>Ⓡ</sup> de Medik8: vitamina C más protección solar de día, vitamina A de noche. Sigue este enfoque sencillo y clínicamente probado y descubre una piel bonita para toda la vida.
